content:
Craft an item of type: honey_block
inventory=[{"type": "purple_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 44, "index": 31}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "black_terracotta", "quantity": 64, "index": 36}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft a honey_block, I need to place 4 honey_bottles in a square formation on the crafting grid. I will first move one honey_bottle from slot 35 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: honey_block
inventory=[{"type": "sugar", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purple_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 44, "index": 31}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "black_terracotta", "quantity": 64, "index": 36}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}]
thought: Now that one honey_bottle is placed in slot 1, I will place another honey_bottle in slot 2 to the right of it.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: honey_block
inventory=[{"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "purple_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 44, "index": 31}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 2, "index": 35}, {"type": "black_terracotta", "quantity": 64, "index": 36}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}]
thought: Next I will place a honey_bottle below slot 1, in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: honey_block
inventory=[{"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "purple_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 44, "index": 31}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "black_terracotta", "quantity": 64, "index": 36}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}]
thought: Finally I will place the last honey_bottle to the right of the honey_bottle in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: honey_block
inventory=[{"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "purple_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 44, "index": 31}, {"type": "black_terracotta", "quantity": 64, "index": 36}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}]
thought: Now that the honey_block has been crafted, I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
